## ğŸ“¦ Installation

### MSIX Package (Recommended)

1. Download `CPCRemote.UI_{VERSION}_x64.msix` below
2. Double-click to install
3. Launch "Connor's PC Remote" from the Start menu

### Manual Installation

See [README.md](https://github.com/clindsay94/Connors-PC-Remote#installation) for manual service installation steps.

## ğŸ“‹ Requirements

- Windows 10/11 (version 22H2 or later)
- Administrator privileges for service installation
